entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3 except 7 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3 except 7 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
